metadata.description: When photojournalist Paul Patton, Jr. donned a super hero costume, he thought it would be a quick way to make some news -- now the strange and unusual just can't help but be drawn to the freak-magnetism of the fabulous fighting FOX! Get in on the ground floor with the hottest new series featuring art and story from the biggest names in comics today!
metadata.name: The Fox: Freak Magnet
